pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aleo is a contemporary typeface designed by Alessio Laiso as the slab serif companion to the Lato font by ≈Åukasz Dziedzic. Aleo has semi-rounded details and a sleek structure, giving it a strong personality while still keeping readability high. The family comprises six styles: three weights (light, regular and bold) with corresponding true italics.
